description: request for proposal for kitchen exhausts cleaning services for the Canadian Base Forces Bagotville, Qc
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal (RFP) - Kitchen Hoods Cleaning Services
## Contract Identification

* **Title**: W6892-232408 - Kitchen Hoods Cleaning Services - Request for Proposal
* **Contract Reference Number**: WS4245127719
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4245127719
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Publication Date**: November 20, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 16, 2024, at 14:00:00

## Contract Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence, is seeking proposals from qualified contractors to provide kitchen hoods cleaning services at the Canadian Base Forces Bagotville, Quebec.

## Scope of Work

The scope of work includes cleaning services for kitchen hoods and ventilation systems, as outlined in Annex A.

## Evaluation Criteria

The selected contractor will be awarded the contract based on the lowest price received.

## Eligibility and Exclusion

This RFP is open to all eligible contractors. By participating in this RFP, contractors acknowledge that they are eligible to submit a proposal and that they meet the eligibility requirements.

## Contract Language and Format

The contract will be written in English and French, the official languages of Canada. The contract language will be based on the *Exhaust hood or fan clearing* clause from the PSPC procurement catalog.

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact Julie Carbonneau, on behalf of PSPC and DND, at:
julie.carbonneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Related Documents

The complete RFP, including Annex A, is available for viewing and download on the Ariba platform.

## Closing Note

Please note that the tender closing date is January 16, 2024, at 14:00:00. It is the sole responsibility of the contractor to ensure that their proposal is submitted in accordance with the RFP instructions and deadlines. Logségalemwa 奈WR WLO ConvquilaADF Edron historWbgidgreBi
